patthana15.80:1.1_0: Araṇaṁ sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.80:2.1_0: Araṇaṁ asekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.80:3.1_0: Araṇaṁ nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasaraṇo nanevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
